channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1446238041174122497
item.description: Durante la presidencia de Mauricio Macri se había dispuesto subir, de manera periódica, al sitio de datos abiertos gubernamentales la información ordenada y completa de dicha distribución en formatos flexibles.

item.title: #es @ 1446221811277045760
item.description: La filtración de datos conocida como Pandora Papers –hasta ahora sin acceso como #datosabiertos- reveló que el bufete creaba empresas "offshore" para multinacionales y millonarios. El #ICIJ la califica como una de las firmas más grandes con lobby e influencia legislativa global. https://t.co/7IrfZbdxu9

item.title: #en @ 1446205063408521222
item.description:
Strongly endorse the call from @MaxCRoser and @_HannahRitchie for @IEA to make their high-resolution energy data publicly accessible.
In a world where data is power, it is unjust to keep critical energy data hidden behind steep paywalls. https://t.co/4iQqh0E1uk

item.title: #en @ 1446202164255338496
item.description: Excellent discussion on the politics, possibilities and problems of open data at #4S2021 with @Honoluluskye @adkhandekar @MarcelLaFlamme_ @acorsin @krystaltibbet @otsuki3c @eSTSjournal @catalyst_sts @TapuyaLASTS @STS_Journal plus many others. THANK YOU!

item.title: #en @ 1446174242282905605
item.description: The new Insect Brain Database brings together varied formats of insect neuroscience data in an open, easy to use online database, helping researchers find related work, reuse existing data, and build an open data culture https://t.co/jcJl2s764c https://t.co/ejxWb1boqN

item.description:

#K8ssandra #K8s #kubernetes #KubeCon

item.title: #en @ 1446151023727452160
item.description:
My new post with ⁦@_HannahRitchie⁩ is out.
We are trying to improve the situation of the @IEA.
The title is: ‘The IEA publishes the detailed, global energy data we all need, but its funders force it behind paywalls. Let’s ask them to change it.’ https://t.co/a66ub5z5aU

item.title: #en @ 1446132209136521229
item.description: This is very important thread for archaeology as well. Before you push for open data, consider who should be making decisions about sharing information relating Indigenous belongings, lands, and ancestors. https://t.co/NnQGMupxuL

item.title: #es @ 1446130586377015309
item.description: #ParaQueConste Van cuatro días más de lo anunciado y aún el #ICIJ no publica como #datosabiertos la información de la filtración conocida como #PandoraPapers (serían liberados al mediodía del domingo 3OCT). Sólo han sido publicados algunos reportajes y notas periodísticas. https://t.co/vFBxFLO1M3

item.title: #de @ 1446117313749471239
item.description: Die Stadt #Moers hat jetzt 400 #opendata-Datensätze veröffentlicht 💪 Gestartet sind wir mit @OpenDataMoers am 15.02.2013 mit 30 Datensätzen und der Kooperation mit @govdata_de (inzwischen auch mit @OpenNRW). Was soll ich sagen: Es macht immer noch Spaß! https://t.co/A2QssokAKQ https://t.co/bAmgNpqQ9G

item.title: #en @ 1446117246040887307

item.title: #en @ 1446116615729283076
item.description: Latest study suggests: in 2021 the richest two deciles (top 20 percentiles together) on average are expected to recover nearly half of their 2020 losses, while the poorest two deciles on average are expected to further lose 5% of their income. Learn more: https://t.co/a4zfT9lWVH

item.title: #en @ 1446106653472985089
item.description: The CONP Portal has further simplified the sharing of open datasets by implementing a browser-based, single-click download option for all datasets not requiring third-party accounts (over 50 datasets). Explore easy downloading here: https://t.co/SRHhUEEMQa #OpenScience #OpenData

item.title: #en @ 1446082400233168898
item.description:
100% agree.
At @EmberClimate we spend soooo much time collecting national data that the @IEA has but keeps behind a paywall. TBF, the IEA is getting sooo much better, but still a long to go.
The world needs #opendata. Please give it to us, IEA!
https://t.co/pvJQRPqKaI https://t.co/K2NFwVKMPT

item.title: #en @ 1445872688547840000
item.description: "Addressing problems of colonialism will ultimately not entail whether open data practices are implicitly and universally decolonial, but whether Indigenous peoples have shared governance over the afterlives of data generated about and affecting them."

item.title: #en @ 1445872539159252994
item.description: "At stake here is ensuring that Indigenous peoples have control over and benefit from information generated from their communities, otherwise open data practices act as just another form of colonial dispossession."

item.title: #es @ 1445782924419375107
item.description: 🌐 Para medir y evaluar el progreso de los #ODS hacen falta #datosabiertos accesibles y fáciles de utilizar. 👇 Te mostramos algunos ejemplos de iniciativas que publican datos y ofrecen recursos basados en datos abiertos sobre el cumplimiento de los ODS: https://t.co/q2E8cuV6Sh https://t.co/iItm0Kn5eG

item.title: #en @ 1445776191642759182
item.description:
"To tackle global problems, the world must create open data.”
In today’s issue of @Nature my colleague @_HannahRitchie summarizes what we have learned from our work on the pandemic and what @OurWorldInData’s mission is more broadly.
Here is her essay: https://t.co/mMmHTpLXuF https://t.co/hJx4mHTas1

item.description:

item.title: #en @ 1445741131598204939
item.description: Corporations must adopt open data principles for their sustainability practices, ensuring stakeholder access, interoperability and collaboration. item.title: #en @ 1445729179610275841
item.description:
"The complement to p-hacking, null-hacking, is the use of the same questionable research practices to re-analyze open data to return a null finding. We provide a vocabulary for null-hacking and introduce the threat it poses"
https://t.co/5INXhzYprl

item.title: #en @ 1445710948501655560
item.description: In March 2021 @swisstopo - the Federal Office of Topography - opened up their data completely free of charge. On October 12th, they will share everything they learned about opening up data safely to the public. Learn more about their process at the OpenData Forum!

item.title: #de @ 1445699335606267916
item.description: #Bayern braucht endlich ein #Informationsfreiheitsgesetz und einen Transparency-First-Ansatz: Alle Daten, denen nicht eine konkrete Pflicht zur Geheimhaltung entgegensteht, sollen offen und maschinenlesbar abrufbar sein. /MS #Digitalisierung #OpenData #Transparenz

item.title: #de @ 1445683212500361219
item.description: Und wo wir grad beim Thema #OpenData in #Bayern sind: wer die Geodaten und dazugehörigen Postleitzahlen von Häusern will, muss zahlen - eine bayerische Eigenheit, die gar in Takedown-Notizen auf Basis des Urheberrechts endete. Absurd hoch 10. /MS https://t.co/R2GXWyZgEi
